source:
TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Deushs Aath seeks to teach the koal the wordless ways of the finless ones.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Deushs Aath regarde les jeunes Ondos avec tendresse.
TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_TODO_01<tab>Faire <var 1A 02 /var>/viens<var 1A 01 /var> de la main au jeune Ondo

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the insatiably curious Ondo.
TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_TODO_03<tab>/chuckle at the insatiably curious Ondo.

target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_TODO_04<tab>Faire un rapport à Deushs Aath

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_000<tab>Finless one, honored guest, a moment of your time. We seek the wisssdom of you and your people.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_000<tab>Fsssh... Humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, j'ai besoin que tu m'aides à comprendre vos usss et coutumes, notamment comment les gens de ton peuple communiquent.

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_001<tab>In the water, there are many ways in which we Ondo may communicate with one another without relying on ssspeech. However, in this new environment of ours, our options are sssomewhat more restricted.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_001<tab>Nous autres Ondos avons l'habitude d'échanger des messages dans l'eau sssans parler... mais comme tu le sssais, la mer sss'est retirée, et donc nous devons trouver un autre moyen de nous exprimer efficacccement.

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_002<tab>The koal wish to learn other techniques, but I have limited knowledge of such things. Might you speak with this child and demonssstrate for him your methods?
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_002<tab>Ccc'est sssurtout important pour les jeunes Ondos, dont le nom inclut généralement “Koal”, parccce qu'ils ont plusss de mal que les autres à sss'habituer. J'aimerais donc que tu leur apprennes quelque chose d'utile.

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_005<tab>We seek knowledge of how finless ones communicate with one another without words. Show this child, if you would, such techniques as he wishes to learn.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_005<tab>Fssshmm... Depuis que la mer sss'est retirée, il est difficccile pour nous de communiquer par gessstes. J'aimerais donc que tu apprennes aux jeunes d'iccci cccertains des sssignes que les humains comme toi utilisent. Merccci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_010<tab>You have come at a good time, finless one. Might you be so kind as to demonssstrate how you would, without words, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>beckon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me to come to your side?
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_010<tab>Fssshah<var 1D /var>! Sssans-branchies, tu tombes bien, j'ai besoin d'aide<var 1D /var>! Y a-t-il un gessste que les gens de ton peuple utilisent pour sssignifier aux autres de venir vers eux<var 1D /var>? Sssi oui, j'aimerais que tu me l'apprennes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_011<tab>I see, I see! Such exaggerated gestures are sure to be easssily understood even over consssiderable distances.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_011<tab>Fsssheh, voilà qui est intéressant<var 1D /var>! Il sssuffit donc de remuer la main comme ççça. Ccc'est sssimple et efficaccce<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_012<tab>We are about to embark on a hunt. Perhaps I will be able to employ this new technique to great effect to coordinate our movements...
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_012<tab>Je dois aller chasser là. Je vais donc utiliser ccce gessste pour inviter mes camarades. Je te remercccie pour ton aide, sssans-branchies<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_013<tab>There is another of our brethren in the Cups that would benefit from your wisdom. An insssatiably curious Ondo. Please go to him and aid him as you did us.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_013<tab>Au fait, parmi nous, il y a un Ondo par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement curieux. Je crois qu'il sss'intéresse beaucoup au com<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment des humains. Tu devrais aller le voir et lui enssseigner quelque chose, à mon avis.

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_015<tab>No, no, not with your words, finless one! You must <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>beckon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me with your most expresssive motions!
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_015<tab>Comment font les sssans-branchies comme toi pour faire sssigne aux autres de venir vers eux<var 1D /var>? Sss'il te plaît, montre-moi<var 1D /var>! Fsssh...

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_016<tab>Hmm...I do not understand. Are you certain this is how your people would <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>beckon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> one another? It feels rather more confusing than I anticipated...
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEA03580_000_016<tab>Fssshein<var 1D /var>? Ccc'est vraiment comme ççça que tu fais sssigne aux autres de venir vers toi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_020<tab>Finless one, finless one! You are the one who is teaching Ondo how your kind ssspeaks without words, yes? Tell me then: how would you express delight at another's sssurprisingly amusing antics?
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_020<tab>Fsssh<var 1D /var>! Sssalut à toi, humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Dis, je me posais une quessstion, mais tu devrais pouvoir y répondre. Comment les gens comme toi font-ils lorsssqu'ils sss'amusent bien<var 1D /var>? Y a-t-il un com<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment particulier dans ccce cas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_021<tab>With water, one might do so with several spontaneous loops. Without, this “sssomersault” motion becomes rather more difficult. I am told your kind is like to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>chuckle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─what is this? Can you demonssstrate?
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_021<tab>Nous autres Ondos, nous faisons deux culbutes de sssuite... mais ccc'est difficccile à faire hors de l'eau...

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_022<tab>Oh, I see! It is a shaking of the whole body and a contortion of the face! I think I can replicate this motion...
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_022<tab>Fssshoh<var 1D /var>! Tout ccce que vous faites, ccc'est sssecouer votre corps tout en bougeant la mâchoire<var 1D /var>? Tiens, je vais essayer moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_023<tab>Well? Was it not a near-perfect imitation of the chuckle?
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_023<tab>Qu'est-ccce que tu en dis<var 1D /var>? Je l'ai bien fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_A1_000_002<tab>Honestly, I thought you wanted to eat my face.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_A1_000_002<tab>J'ai plutôt eu l'impression que tu étais fâché.

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_024<tab>I knew it! And I owe it all to your excellent instruction. I shall use this new communication technique with pride.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_024<tab>Ccc'est parccce que tu m'as bien montré, sssans-branchies. Je sssuis content d'y être arrivé du premier coup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_025<tab>Really? But your face is not at all appetizing to me. Hmm... I was so certain that I had captured the esssence of the chuckle, but it seems this will require rather more practice...
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_025<tab>Fssshein<var 1D /var>? Pourtant, j'ai fait comme tu m'as montré... Fssshraaah<var 1D /var>! Ccc'est vraiment difficccile<var 1D /var>! Il va falloir que je m'entraîne dur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_026<tab>It was Deushs Aath who first asked you to teach us these techniques, yes? You should return to him and tell him of your efforts. I am sure he will reward you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_026<tab>Fssshah, mais j'y penssse, ccc'est Deushs Aath qui t'a demandé de venir nous apprendre ccce genre de gessstes<var 1D /var>? Sssi ccc'est le cas, je te conssseille d'aller le voir et de demander une récompenssse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_027<tab>As for me, I will go and teach others of the chuckle. My thanks to you for this gift, finless one!
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_027<tab>Moi, je vais aller apprendre aux autres à rire comme des sssans-branchies<var 1D /var>! Merccci pour ton aide, humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_030<tab>Does my question amuse you? That is well, but do not say so with words! You must expresss your enthusssiasm in the finless one way! You must <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>chuckle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for me!
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_030<tab>Je t'en prie, humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, montre-moi comment les gens de ton peuple font quand ils sssont contents<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_031<tab>Oh? This is what it means to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>chuckle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>? Are you sure? It does not seem to quite capture the sense of sssincere but measured delight I was ssstriving to convey...
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_ONDOPEOPLEB03580_000_031<tab>Fssshmmm... Il n'y a pas un moyen plus sssimple<var 1D /var>? Quelque chose de plus naturel, je dirais. Vas-y montre-moi, sss'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_035<tab>The koal seem to be in high ssspirits─or perhaps they have grown that skilled at expresssing themselves with the chuckle already? That is all the more reason I have to thank you for our instruction, then.
target: TEXT_LUCKZJ017_03580_DEUSHSAATH_000_035<tab>Fssshah, te revoilà, humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Tu as appris quelques gessstes aux jeunes d'iccci<var 1D /var>? Je t'en sssuis très re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant. Tiens, voilà pour toi.
